definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: This raspberry color looks too rich.
sentences.chinese: 这个覆盆子色看起来太艳了。

sentences.english: The fruit looks similar to raspberries, but are more orange in color.
sentences.chinese: 果实与覆盆子相近，但颜色更偏橘黄。

sentences.english: Melt the gelatine powder with hot water. Stir into raspberry.
sentences.chinese: 鱼胶粉与热水调至溶解，拌入覆盆子液中。

sentences.english: A few handfuls of raspberries or blackberries will transform the cheapest vodka.
sentences.chinese: 几小勺覆盆子或黑莓可以媲美廉价的伏特加。

sentences.english: Has a rich wild raspberry, black cherry, raspberry aroma.
sentences.chinese: 有着浓郁得野树莓，黑樱桃，覆盆子的香气。

sentences.english: Strictly speaking, the banana is a kind of berry, raspberry, not berry.
sentences.chinese: 严格意义上说，香蕉是一种浆果，覆盆子并非浆果。

sentences.english: Set aside. In a separate bowl, cream together raspberry puree and cream cheese until smooth.
sentences.chinese: 在另一个碗中将覆盆子酱和乳脂芝士搅拌至均匀平滑。

sentences.english: Clear, bright red currant. Intense ripe raspberry and red fruits aromas.
sentences.chinese: 清澈而又亮丽的覆盆子色，给予多种熟红浆果果香。

sentences.english: Eugene was concocting Rossini Cocktails from champagne and pureed raspberries.
sentences.chinese: 尤金当时正在用香槟和覆盆子酱调配罗西尼鸡尾酒。

sentences.english: The wine offers expressive red-berry aromas and a fresh hint of raspberry.
sentences.chinese: 馥郁的红浆果和轻微新鲜覆盆子的芳香相交织。
